entry.name: Dell_DRAC_VirtualDiskScript
entry.description: Temperature sensor data for Dell DRAC7 and newer.
entry.technology: - For ErrorTemperature and WarningTemperature: The value is the value over the threshold in degrees Celsius. This is set to 0 if there is no data collected.

attribute.name: scriptgroovy

datapoint.name: VirtualDiskState
datapoint.alertbody:
The DRAC on ##HOST## is reporting a status code of ##VALUE## for virtual disk ##INSTANCE##, which puts this device in ##LEVEL## state. This started at ##START## - or ##DURATION## ago.
DRAC virtual disk status codes are as follows: 1: unknown 2: ok 3: failure -- data may be lost 4: virtual disk encountered a failure with one or all of the constituent redundant physical disks; data on the virtual disk might no longer be fault tolerant
datapoint.description: the virtual disk components state as monitored by the remote access card; 1=unknown, 2=ok, 3=failure -- data may be lost, 4=virtual disk encountered a failure with one or all of the constituent redundant physical disks
